pr_title: Move the azure-spring-cloud-starter-appconfiguration-config module from sdk/spring to sdk/appconfiguration

timeline.message: Move the azure-spring-cloud-starter-appconfiguration-config module from sdk/spring to sdk/appconfiguration
Move the azure-spring-cloud-starter-appconfiguration-config module from sdk/spring to sdk/appconfiguration

timeline.bodyText:
Seems like we shouldn't use relative links here.
https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk/blob/master/docs/policies/README-TEMPLATE.md#link-guidelines
https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/pull/13989/files#diff-bbc5dba8ff02aedfeed94fd0f102c996
timeline.author: chenrujun
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 # Spring Cloud Azure Config Sample client library for Java
 
-This sample describes how to use [spring-cloud-starter-azure-appconfiguration-config](../../azure-spring-cloud-starter-appconfiguration-config/) to load configuration properties from Azure Configuration Service to Spring Environment.
+This sample describes how to use [spring-cloud-starter-azure-appconfiguration-config](../../../appconfiguration/azure-spring-cloud-starter-appconfiguration-config/) to load configuration properties from Azure Configuration Service to Spring Environment.

timeline.author: chenrujun
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ mvn -Dspring.application.name=foo -Dspring.profiles.active=dev spring-boot:run
 
 ### More details
 
-Please refer to this [README](../../azure-spring-cloud-starter-appconfiguration-config/) about more usage details. 
+Please refer to this [README](../../../appconfiguration/azure-spring-cloud-starter-appconfiguration-config/) about more usage details.
